Quickstart ‚Äã

Initial setup ‚Äã

To start using EasyP, you need to initialize the project.

To do this, run the following command in the terminal:

bash
easyp init
1

Setup linter rules ‚Äã

For example, you can use default linter rules.

yaml
lint:
  use:
    - DEFAULT
1
2
3

Work in progress ‚Äã
